page.title: 10Transport
page.content: The study area is poorly served by the {bus service.}This is due to its poor accessibility from major roads and its winding narrow lanes and steep hills which make up the area. A{once-weekly bus service serves{Stanford Dingley itself. The main service goes through {Bradfield}between{Reading}and{Newbury, 3 times a day between 8.00 a.m and 5.00 p.m, with no Sunday service. Apart from the one-man{Mini Cab service which serves this area, there is a{volunteer transport service}for O.A.Ps. Transport to the nearest school which is 6 miles away relies upon the bus service or private cars. There is a{mobile library}which visits the area once a week.
